Title: Renovate vulnerable to arbitrary command injection via Gradle Wrapper and malicious `distributionUrl`
Description: Renovate can be tricked into executing shell code while updating the Gradle Wrapper. A malicious `distributionUrl` in `gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties` can lead to command execution in the Renovate runtime.
NotImpacted: All versions before 32.124.0, all versions starting from 42.68.5
